snippet.title: FFF Game Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2139620/FFF/

FFF is a funny game about friendship, family, and fun. You are a newly elected space emperor, and your goal is to make everyone your friend. Even if they don't want to be. You will travel through the vast expanse of space, spreading your kindness to anyone you cross to become the most loved ruler that ever lived.
